sources.title: Knight Club | Full Movie | Action Crime Thriller | Lochlyn Munro | Lou Diamond Phillips
sources.description:
Knight Club - A wannabe actor becomes a bouncer and is seduced by the fast-paced world of Los Angeles nightlife.
2001. Stars: Lochlyn Munro, Lou Diamond Phillips, Glenn Plummer, Ed Lauter

metadata.Plot: Every night's a party night in Hollywood. But to get into the party you have to get past the doorman. When it comes to the hottest nightclubs in L.A., the bouncers aren't just bouncers - they're called Knights. Dick Gueron is the best of the best - he runs the "Knight Club". When one of his best bouncers, Gary Grieco is offered a job at a rival club dick sees this as a personal betrayal and seeks revenge...
metadata.Actors: Lochlyn Munro, Glenn Plummer, Ed Lauter
